testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to update the information of the blog category with the specified ID via an API connection.
testcase.name: When a PATCH request with valid authorization and correct data (title) is sent to the /api/updateBlogCategory/{id}
testcase.system-out: * The api user sends a POST request to the api "addBlogCategory" endpoint to create a new "blogCategory" record and records the "Added Blog Category ID" information..passed * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/updateBlogCategory" path parameters................passed * The api user prepares a PATCH request containing the "Education and Training" information to send to the api updateBlogCategory endpoint..passed * The api user sends a "PATCH" request and saves the returned response......passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "remark" information in the response body is "success"..passed * The api user verifies that the "Message" information in the response body is "Successfully Updated."..passed * The api user verifies that the "Updated Blog Category ID" information in the returned response body is the same as the id path parameter written in the endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the "data.title" is "Education and Training" by sending a GET request to the "api" "blogCategory" endpoint with the "Updated Blog Category ID" returned in the response body..passed
